channel.title: Resources :: Choria Configuration Manager
channel.description: A resource is how you describe the desired state of your infrastructure. They represent a thing you want to manage and they are backed by providers which implement the actual management for your Operating System. Each resource has a type and a unique name followed by some resource-specific properties. Package When you manage a package, you describe the stable state you desire. Should the package merely be present, or the latest version, or a specific version?
